# PlainCost â€” Cost of Living Data

> PlainCost provides free access to cost of living data across the United States, sourced from the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis Regional Price Parities (RPP).

## Data Coverage
- Regional Price Parities for 384 metropolitan areas and 51 states
- Categories: overall, goods, services, rents
- Historical data (2008-2024)
- Salary equivalent calculator
- Side-by-side metro comparisons

## Data Source
U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis, Regional Price Parities by State and Metro Area
https://www.bea.gov/data/prices-inflation/regional-price-parities-state-and-metro-area

## Pages
- Homepage: https://plaincost.com/
- Metro directory: https://plaincost.com/metros
- Metro profiles: https://plaincost.com/metro/{slug}
- State directory: https://plaincost.com/states
- State profiles: https://plaincost.com/state/{slug}
- Compare: https://plaincost.com/compare
- Calculator: https://plaincost.com/calculator
- Rankings: https://plaincost.com/rankings
- Search: https://plaincost.com/search
